Li.name: Lithium
Li.description: The product replicates the price of lithium perceived by the markets in the Krok area.

Ti.name: Titanium
Ti.description: The product replicates the price of titanium perceived by the markets in the Krok area.

Nb.name: Niobium
Nb.description: The product replicates the price of niobium perceived by the markets in the Krok area.

W.name: Tungsten
W.description: The product replicates the price of tungsten perceived by the markets in the Krok area.

Rh.name: Rhodium
Rh.description: The product replicates the price of rhodium perceived by the markets in the Krok area.

Au.name: Gold
Au.description: The product replicates the price of gold perceived by the markets in the Krok area.

Si.name: Silicon
Si.description: The product replicates the price of silicon perceived by the markets in the Krok area.

O.name: Oxygen
O.description: The product replicates the price of oxygen perceived by the markets in the Krok area.

U.name: Uranium
U.description: The product replicates the price of uranium perceived by the markets in the Krok area.

P-310.name: E-126 Paletium
P-310.description: The product replicates the price of non-radioactive paletium perceived by the markets of the Krok area.

Gra-310.name: E-134 Grain
Gra-310.description: The product replicates the price of non-radioactive grain perceived by the markets of the Krok area.

OLZ.name: Olyze
OLZ.description: Founded in 2127 by Miss FDU Stacy Collins by purchasing Astro Cosmetica, a company with great potential but brought to the brink of bankruptcy by an incompetent CEO, Collins Cosmetica is a company that produces unique cosmetic products and promotes the founder's brand with partnerships with brands at the top of the luxury pyramid.

CC.name: Collins Cosmetica
CC.description: Founded in 2127 by Miss FDU Stacy Collins by purchasing Astro Cosmetica, a company with great potential but brought to the brink of bankruptcy by an incompetent CEO, Collins Cosmetica is a company that produces unique cosmetic products and promotes the founder's brand with partnerships with brands at the top of the luxury pyramid.

GO-GO.name: Gomes Gold
GO-GO.description: Founded in 2127 by Miss FDU Stacy Collins by purchasing Astro Cosmetica, a company with great potential but brought to the brink of bankruptcy by an incompetent CEO, Collins Cosmetica is a company that produces unique cosmetic products and promotes the founder's brand with partnerships with brands at the top of the luxury pyramid.

NASH-PA.name: Nashaty Precious Animals
NASH-PA.description: Founded in 2101 by Miss FDU 2100 Nida Nashaty to cultivate one of her many passions at the highest level, Nashaty Animali Preziosi is a company specialized in the breeding and domestication of ferocious companion animals for the luxury market, with particular attention to poisonous snakes. Nashaty Precious Animals is supported by both the Gavomex War Center, the Council of Angels of the Universal Church and the Eye of Tharsis command.

BRV.name: Bio Krovix
BRV.description: Bio Krovix is ​​a company that markets superb quality BIO food products at honest prices originating solely from the Krentorian agri-food industry.

GXB.name: Genetyx Bio
GXB.description: Founded in 2042 through an agreement between Sintetix Bio (SXB) and ACQ, Genetyx Bio aims to gain the trust of skeptical consumers of the purely synthetic market by offering 50% organic and 50% artificial foods which, according to many nutritionists, could represent a valid alternative to their extremist counterparts.

TMU.name: Torpex Mining Union
TMU.description: The Torpex Mining Union is the largest cosmic company operating in the raw materials sector and being totally managed and administered by Torpex personnel it has no rivals in this field.

SXB.name: Sintetix Bio
SXB.description: Sintetix Bio is a company that produces synthetic food through direct cloning of biological counterparts. SXB's goal is to offer consumers an excellent alternative to expensive organic foods and at the same time safeguard their purchasing power.

UKG.name: Universal Kryborg
UKG.description: Universal Kryborg was born in 2062 from the union of two small companies operating in the metallurgy, energy and consumer goods sectors. Initially frowned upon due to its relations with the Syrotechnic cult, it managed, thanks to the diplomatic skills of its representatives, to conquer decent market shares, as well as obtaining access to hyperparsec conduits for the transit of its goods.

FAT-R.name: Òlrax and Òrax Raw Fairtrade
FAT-R.description: Fairtrade and Sustainable Market of the free planets of Òlrax and Òrax which operates in the raw materials sector.

QEQ.name: Qüan en Qüant
QEQ.description: Company that mainly deals with the trade of any type of consumer good but is also active in the sector dedicated to luxury goods.

FAT-D.name: Developed Fair Market of Òlrax and Òrax
FAT-D.description: Fairtrade and Sustainable Market of the free planets of Òlrax and Òrax which attempts to emerge in the consumer goods sector.

QTA-AS.name: Assets section of the Qüark Trade Alliance
QTA-AS.description: Special corporation supported by Qüomq which mainly deals with the trade of consumer and luxury goods of all kinds.

QTA-SP.name: Space section of the Qüark Trade Alliance
QTA-SP.description: Special corporation supported by Qüomq that sells territories, celestial objects and regions of space by the Km³.

QTA-EX.name: Exchange section of the Qüark Trade Alliance
QTA-EX.description: Special corporation supported by Qüomq that sells skills through the practice of symorphic injection and provides highly trained personnel for any type of eventuality.

NAL-E.name: Nalah – Energy
NAL-E.description: The energy section of Nalah offers clean electric energy through its revolutionary magnetic motor capable of rotating at speeds that were previously unthinkable.

UC-E.name: Universal Church – Energy
UC-E.description: The energy section of the Universal Church is the largest Human company in the energy sector.

QTA-EN.name: Energy section of the Qüark Trade Alliance
QTA-EN.description: Special corporation supported by Qüomq that sells all types of energy at the standard price defined by QTA economists.

UC.name: Universal Church
UC.description: Human Company that offers high-quality weapons and protection, competent personnel and medical solutions at competitive prices and enjoys special privileges due to its excellent relationships with some members of the Qüomq.

NAL.name: Nalah
NAL.description: Founded in 2063 by the adept Tehl-Nalahzor to counter the economic power of the Universal Church in all its fields, it is a very active company in the energy field, in the medical field and in the special field.

KRT.name: Krattok
KRT.description: Krattok is a Krentorian warfare company specializing in creating weapons with the greatest possible firepower in the smallest possible space.

MTR.name: Mantkor
MTR.description: Born in early 2062 from the collaboration of some enlightened Human magnates, Qüark and spiritual guides, Mantkor is a company active in the special market whose primary objective is the creation of weapons capable of ending wars more quickly.

CSA.name: Cosmic Arsenal
CSA.description: Founded on Gaia in 2058 at the behest of a thriving metallurgical business group, it quickly acquired the support of the Earth Government, which made it the first Human war company, fully active in the special market. Known throughout the Galaxy for the effectiveness and excellent workmanship of its weapons, it represents, after the Universal Church, the second most feared company among the other GCCs on the market.

OLS.name: Olonovis
OLS.description: The mission of this small company is identified in the development of the perfect protection system for every need. It currently offers top-level technosuits capable of facing even the dangers of space and intelligent tactical shields for devices capable of self-calibrating in relation to the damage suffered. Olonovis products are in great demand both in the war field, in the form of overalls, and in the industrial sector in the form of PPE, in order to prevent accidents at work.

LCA.name: Lux Canori Arsenal
LCA.description: A company specializing in weapons and equipment using coherent light beam technology, it offers a vast range of products intended for the war sector and the mining industry. The Canori laser, after the Torpex xerolaser, is the best-selling tool in this sector and, as declared by the president of Lux Canori Arsenal, "it is the perfect companion of the modern miner".

GOE.name: Guild of Exiles
GOE.description: The Guild of Exiles is an organization made up of millions of brilliant minds capable of lifting up and relaunching entire populations, in order to safeguard future incomes and support the constant growth of the Special, Exchange and Space sectors.

OG.name: Oppressors' Guild
OG.description: Personally directed by the infamous Qüark financier Khàr-Kranìka, the Oppressors' Guild is an organization made up of millions of Qüark slave traders called corporals. The organization has a commercial agreement with a mysterious member of the Court of Sirone which provides for the payment of a quota in Krok equal to 38% of the daily work carried out only by the Qüark slaves provided by the guild.

QG.name: Quarrymen's Guild
QG.description: The result of a Torpex-Qüark collaboration, the Miners' Guild provides cheap labor alongside the haughty Torpex steelworkers to aid the colonial expansionism of technologically unsuitable states with a complex system of loans and compound interest financing.

QTA-TK.name: Koburak Timocracy
QTA-TK.description: The index reports the real-time result of the relations between the Krok area and the internal economy of Koburàk.

QTA-AO.name: Arabayma oligarchy
QTA-AO.description: The index reports the real-time result of the relations between the Krok area and the internal economy of Arabayma.

QTA-GO.name: Qüark Trade Alliance and Grisian Oligarchy
QTA-GO.description: The index reports the real-time result of the relationships between the Krok area and the Griso area.

QTA.name: Qüark Trade Alliance
QTA.description: The index reports the real-time result of the most significant trades within the Krok area.

QTA-RW.name: QTA-RW
QTA-RW.description: The index reports the degree of investor interest in the raw materials market in the Krok area.
